title: Get The Complete Calvin Hobbes Box Set For A Fantastic Price Before It's Gone

description:
The follow-up to Yacht Club's indie hit Shovel Knight will have to wait a little longer, as the studio has announced that Mina the Hollower will be delayed out of its previously announced Halloween release date. While Yacht Club said this delay will be a short one, it isn't prepared to nail down an exact date just yet.

"This week, our team made a tough decision: we decided to delay Mina the Hollower," the team wrote on its official site. "The entire crew has been working tirelessly day and night to finish development for release on October 31, but we’re just not quite there yet. This isn’t a major delay, it’s just a stretch of time to apply some final polish and balancing to make the game truly shine."

Though the delay is short, though, Yacht Club
title: Shovel Knight Dev's Next Game Mina The Hollower Delayed, But Not For Long

description:
Battlefield 6 launches worldwide on October 10. The game's multiplayer includes four distinct classes, and it's important to understand the different abilities and gadgets that come paired with each one so you can pick the classes best suited to your playstyle and preferred game modes. In this guide, we break down all the classes in Battlefield 6, including their respective gadgets, signature weapons, traits, and more.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • Battlefield 6 class types

Battlefield 6 class types

Starting with a simplified breakdown of the classes, they are as follows:
title: All Battlefield 6 Classes: Gadgets, Traits, And Best Weapons For Each Class

description:
Last year, Nintendo sued James Williams, a moderator for a Switch pirates page on Reddit who posted under the name Archbox. Now, Nintendo has set the damages it wants from the court, and it could leave Williams with a penalty for several million dollars.

Nintendo's legal complaint has been posted online (via Oatmeal Dome), and it's asking for $4.5 million because it contends that Williams operated multiple Switch piracy sites, sold hardware hacks, and offered modified Switch consoles with pirate
title: Nintendo Is Suing A Reddit Moderator For $4.5 Million

description: From new mega evolutions to an overhauled battle system and the Z-A Royale, here’s everything to know about Pokémon Legends Z-A.
title: Pokémon Legends Z-A Everything To Know

description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 was the biggest-selling game of the year in the United States for 2024, and it set a franchise record as well. However, the decision to make Black Ops 6 a day-one launch title for Xbox Game Pass reportedly cost the Call of Duty franchise millions of dollars.

According to Bloomberg, a former Microsoft employee disclosed that Call of Duty console and PC sales were $300 million lower in 2024 than they were in 2023. As previously disclosed, 82% of all Black Ops 6 sales came from PlayStation consoles.

One of the primary reasons Microsoft purchased COD publisher Activision Blizzard was to get new exclusive titles for Game Pas
title: Call Of Duty Lost $300 Million In Sales Due To Game Pass - Report
D&D Visual History Special Edition Box Set Is Only $45 For Big Deal Days

description:
The Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 multiplayer beta began on October 2 and was quickly interrupted by cheaters. Of course, cheating happens in most popular multiplayer games, and with the surface area of Call of Duty being so large, cheaters were always going to find a way to do what they do.

Now, Activision has shared some data points about cheating in the beta so far, led by the statistic that 97% of cheaters were stopped within 30 minutes of when they signed in for the early-access beta. Further, fewer than 1% of people who attempted to cheat ac
title: Black Ops 7 Cheaters In The Beta Were Booted Very Quickly, Activision Says
This Super Mario Costume Is Cursed, But At Least It's Cheap Before Halloween

description:
Battlefield 6 officially launches on October 10, but some people already have the game in hand. One person on Reddit posted a photo of the game's Phantom Edition for PS5. It sports the PEGI logo, which means the copy of game likely came from a European retailer, but it's not clear which one.

Many theorized that, although this person obtained a copy of the game early, they might not be able to play until the servers officially go live. However, the person said the servers are online already and the campaign is playable as well. Officially, EA says Battlefield 6 servers go live on October 10.
title: Battlefield 6 Physical Copies Already In The Wild And Servers Live Early, Apparently

description:
Recently, a rumor swirled online that Microsoft was canceling its next-generation Xbox plans, but that is apparently not true or the full story. Microsoft said in a statement that it is "actively investing" in future first-party consoles and devices that are "designed, engineered, and built by Xbox."

The statement, shared with Windows Central, pointed fans to the announcement from June this year that Microsoft is working with AMD on future consoles and devices.

At the time, Xbox president Sarah Bond said Microsoft and AMD will work together to "co-engineer silicon across a portfolio of devices, including our next-generation Xbox consoles. In your living room and in your hands."
title: Future Xbox Consoles Not Canceled, Microsoft Says

description:
The latest Pokemon event at GameStop hasn't gone as many would like, to say the least. The retailer distributed physical cards containing codes for Shiny Koraidon and Shiny Miraidon to be redeemed in Pokemon Scarlet and Violet beginning September 26. But after the well of codes quickly ran dry, GameStop announced that a second wave of codes arrived this past weekend, albeit with a catch.

GameStop has approximately 50 codes per store, according to a statement on X. These codes will be printed on receipts instead of the usual cards with unique art. The statement emphasizes the limited nature of this second round, adding that the retailer is committed to distributing every code it receives and providing more if The Pokemon Company makes them available.
title: GameStop Restocks Shiny Pokemon Codes As Fans Complain Of Scarcity And Scalping
Gorgeous Final Fantasy Art Book Box Set Is Nearly 50% Off For Prime Big Deal Days

description: With EA's future uncertain, Lucy and Kurt ponder how they would save EA's reputation if they could.
title: How Can EA Save Its Reputation?

description:
Building Tips


When gamers and game critics talk about '4X games,' they're talking about games like Civilization, where the goal is to "Explore, Expand, Exploit, Exterminate." Satisfactory is kind of a 4X game, too, though it's quite different from those turn-based affairs. In Satisfactory, your goal is to Explore, Exploit, Expand, Excel (for the profit of the Ficsit Corporation).

Expanding--building out your factory--is how you'll spend the vast majority of time in your game. We have a Satisfactory beginner's guide with some general ideas to get the most out of the game early on, but building is such a big thing that we wanted to dive into it separately.
title: 10 Satisfactory Building Tips To Maximize Efficiency

description:
Satisfactory Beginner's Guide


Satisfactory should be a boring game because, at its core, it's really about logistics. You'll manage power usage, conveyor belt and production speeds, rail stops, and more. But instead, it's a compelling, tactile game that, yes, asks you to do all of that, but puts you in the middle of the factory in a first-person perspective. Once you build a factory line, you can walk along and see every step of it close up, and even grab a piece off of the production lines.

The game's title is just about perfect. Satisfactory is a game about making a Satisfying Factory. It can be a complex game, though, and we're here to help you get through some of the most frustrating early moments of the game. Here are some of our essential Satisfac
title: 14 Beginner Tips For Maximum Satisfaction In Satisfactory

description:
Less a walking simulator and more of a hiking simulator, Firewatch captured hearts when it took gamers for an adventurous, lonely summer in Wyoming’s Shoshone National Forest. From unravelling thrilling mysteries to building a complicated relationship over walkie-talkie, Firewatch is a unique adventure game with few analogs.

Firewatch developer Campo Santo announced a second game, In The Valley Of The Gods, at The Game Awards in 2017, but it has since fallen into development difficulties after the studio was acquired by Valve. In lieu of any more games on the horizon from the developer, we’ve collected 15 of the best games like Firewatch that explore similar gameplay, themes, and narrati
title: 15 Best Games Like Firewatch To Explore In 2025

description:
Science-fiction games encompass one of the premier genres in the video game market, and there are dozens of top-notch sci-fi games available to sink your teeth into. The entire sci-fi genre across media is made up of dozens of distinct franchises, and there is certainly some blending between television, movies, and video games. While some of these franchises make for fantastic games, there are also unique sci-fi titles that solely lie in the gaming industry.

Today, our goal is to identify some of the best sci-fi games you can currently play. If you're a fan of the genre at all, you'll certainly see some familiar franchises as well as a few of the most popular games the genre has to offer. However, we've also identified some underrated science fiction games that might just be the next title you download.
title: Best Science Fiction Games To Explore In 2025

description:
Despite there being countless different experiences on Roblox, the action title Blox Fruits remains hugely popular and retains a high player count even years after launch. A sea-faring adventure based on one piece of particularly famous manga, Blox Fruits is one of the most exciting games on the entire platform.

If you want to live life as a pirate, you’d better start believing in Blox Fruits, as the game’s devil fruits are essential to your progress. These fruits give you different abilities, and can make all the difference when it comes to PvP, especially. So, we’re diving into our Blox Fruits tier list so you know exactly which fruits to find first.

The best Blox Fruits tier list

In the world of Blox Fruits, there are dozens of Fruits to collect, s
title: Blox Fruits Tier List - All The Best Devil Fruits

description:
Rockstar reportedly has a Switch 2 version of Red Dead Redemption 2 in the works, alongside PS5 and Xbox Series X|S updates for the open-world game. However, it's apparently unclear when they will come out.

Reliable leaker NateTheHate2 reconfirmed that "they exist" on X, regarding Red Dead Redemption 2 versions for current-gen consoles and Switch 2. "I have no update on timing for release," NateTheHate 2 added in response to a question about the prequel starring Arthur Morgan. The theory floated to the leaker was that Rockstar would want to release these new editions fairly soon, with the studio focusing on Grand Theft Auto VI next year.

In June, NateTheHate 2 stated that
title: Red Dead Redemption 2 Still Planned For PS5, Xbox Series X|S, And Switch 2 - Report

description:
A vulnerability found in the Unity game engine has led to studio Obsidian Entertainment taking down five of its games, including the premium edition of its 2025 release Avowed.

The Unity issue, discovered in June and patched on October 2, could have allowed "local code execution and access to confidential information on end user devices running unity-built applications," reads an advisory on the official Unity website. Although Unity states that there is no evidence of any impact on users, developers are still recommended to "rebuild your games and applications with updated Unity versions."

In response to the discovery, Obsidian announced on Friday that it had temporarily removed some of its titles from digital storefronts to "implement the necessary updates" toward the security issue. Along with Avowed Premium Edition, Obsidian also removed the Grounded 2 Founder
title: Avowed Studio Obsidian Removes Several Games From Sale Due To Unity Security Issues

description:
Want to know when the next Grow A Garden update is? Releasing weekly since the game started in March 2025, every new patch brings new items and plenty of other fun to keep you playing and collecting all the different plant and pet variants. Some events are more elaborate in their design, introducing Obbies and other secret areas to discover.

Every update in this Roblox game brings along with it a whole bunch of new unlockables, such as Grow A Garden pets with themed effects, seeds to grow in your garden, and even occasionally new Grow A Garden mutations never seen before. The best events are ones that require a little more time playing the game, such as exploring new areas outside of the main garden. The rewards are
title: Next Grow A Garden Update And Events

description:
Any video game with a dragon involved is often placed on a higher pedestal than other games. The mere sight of the mythical winged creatures in a game causes shock and awe from the audience, and some of the best games in the industry prominently feature dragons in some shape or form. While you might know a few games with dragons, you might not know that there are dozens of other titles where you can experience them as well.

Today, our goal is to identify the best games with dragons that you can play in 2025. These games will either feature dragons as enemies, side attractions, or actual characters that you can play as throughout your journey. We've tried to list games that are easily playable in 2025 as well, so you might not see some classic dragon games that are only playable on older consoles.


The Elder Sc
title: Best Games With Dragons To Bite Into In 2025

description:
Next year marks the 30th anniversary of Resident Evil, as well as the franchise's return to the big screen courtesy of Weapons and Barbarian director Zach Cregger. The Resident Evil reboot is set to begin filming soon, and Cregger has lined up a few more performers for the movie.

According to The Hollywood Reporter, Zach Cherry is one of the latest additions to Resident Evil. His character is said to be a scientist who works at a hospital. Cherry was previously nominated for an Emmy for his performance as Dylan George in Apple TV+'s Severance. He has also appeared in minor roles in Spider-Man: Homecoming, Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings, and the Fallout TV series.

True Detective: Night Country act
title: Resident Evil Movie Adds Severance Star And More Cast Members

description:
The Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 beta rolls on with some major new changes and additions, including the beta opening up to everyone and the debut of a mostly non-SBMM playlist.

Open for all

The Black Ops 7 multiplayer beta kicked off on October 2, but only for people who preordered the game, had Game Pass Ultimate, or obtained a code by another means. As of October 5, however, the beta is now free and open to everyone on all platforms. The beta runs through October 8.

All you have to do is find the game client from your preferred platforms--PC, PlayStation, or Xbox--and you should be all set.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 7 Beta Adds Non-SBMM Playlist, Opens For Everyone
